channel.title: Tamar Zandberg on Liam Getreu
channel.description: Recent content in Tamar Zandberg on Liam Getreu

item.title: NIF event: Adam Bandt and Tamar Zandberg on progressive politics
item.description: I had the privilege to interview two leaders shaping their country’s political conversations – Adam Bandt, leader of the Australian Greens, and Tamar Zandberg, Knesset member and former leader of Israel’s Meretz – on how they are shifting the political goal posts and taking decisive action rooted in shared values of equality, democracy and justice.
